name: Guapo
description: '''Guapo''' is a British [[experimental rock]]/[[art rock]] band formed in 1994 by drummer/percussionist Dave Smith and guitarist/vocalist Matt Thompson, though the band gained a wider audience with the contribution of multi-instrumentalist [[Daniel O'Sullivan (musician)|Daniel O'Sullivan]].  The lineup as of 2015 consists of Smith, guitarist [[Kavus Torabi]], bassist Sam Warren and keyboardist Emmett Elvin of [[Chrome Hoof]].
